prompts: Create a muscular fighting-type Pokemon with gray skin and a determined expression.
I want a Pokemon that resembles an athlete, with strong arms and a competitive spirit.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon that showcases strength, featuring a prominent jaw and fierce eyes.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of power and agility, with blue and white coloration.
Imagine a bipedal creature designed for battle, showcasing its muscles and combat-ready stance.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of training and discipline, with defined features.
Give me an image of a powerful Pokemon that thrives in both urban and natural environments.
